metadata.title: CVE-2022-27146 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: GPAC mp4box 1.1.0-DEV-rev1759-geb2d1e6dd-has a heap-buffer-overflowvulnerability in function gf_isom_apple_enum_tag.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
